gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 132, Hornets 112
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pelicans defeated the Hornets, 132-112. Brandon Ingram led the Pelicans with his first triple-double of the season and third of his career with 28 points (season-high 7-11 3PT, 10 rebounds, and 10 assists as CJ McCollum (22 points, six rebounds, six assists, four 3PT) and Jordan Hawkins (21 points, six rebounds, six 3PT) totaled 43 points. LaMelo Ball (29 points, five rebounds, seven assists) and Terry Rozier (25 points, seven 3PT) led Charlotte in the loss. New Orleans improve to 25-17 as the Hornets lose their sixth straight and move to 8-30.
